page.title: 15Organisations 3
page.content:
Church Events according to the church calendar. 1 Mothering Sunday Service . 2 Annual performance of Bach's St Matthew Passion on Good Friday. 3 Harvest Festival - Harvest Supper. 4 Carol Service and Blessing of the Crib.
The Chapel. Chapel services and "cymdeithas" which include weekday meetings, social events, and "Swper Gwyl Dewi.Church, Chapel and R.C.'s have an annual United Service,Annual Women's Day, and prayers.Also Chapel, Church and School have a joint effort for Christian Aid.(The Sponsored Walk)
9 Annual Carnival-fancy dress etc. 10 Various events to which parents and public are invited.Sports day, Christmas Fayre and Christmas Concert.
